Title: Metatranscriptomic Sequencing of Los Angeles Influent Sewage
Design Description: Samples (60-ml) were filtered through 0.22-μm vacuum filters, then ultracentrifugated with 10-kDa Amicon filters until volumes were reduced to <500 μl. These concentrates were stored at −80°C before RNA extraction. Subsequently an Invitrogen PureLink RNA minikit with DNase (Invitrogen, Waltham, MA cite) was used to extract RNA following the manufacturer's protocol. Library preparation was performed by UC GRT Hub using the Illumina RNA prep with enrichment kit.
